core:description.text: Exquisitely sheer silk stockings in a delicate nude shade that seems to disappear against bare skin. The fine silk weave creates a barely-there sensation, adding a subtle sheen to the legs while remaining almost invisible. These elegant stockings extend to mid-thigh, held in place by their own gentle grip. The silk is cool to the touch initially, warming quickly against the body, and moves with a whispered grace.
